newsitem.title: ITALY: Autostrade shareholder core seen by June.
newsitem.headline: Autostrade shareholder core seen by June.

text.p: The selection of a stable core of shareholders for Italian motorway manager Autostrade after privatisation should be made by the end of June, the director general of state industrial holding IRI said on Friday.
Pietro Ciucci, director general at the state holding which controls Autostrade, said a public share offer (OPV) for the motorway manager should get underway in September.
"As soon as the guidelines are finished, IRI will start with the privatisation, first constructing a stable nucleus and then launching the OPV," Ciucci said, talking on the fringe of a meeting here.
"And in order to carry out the two operations, the months of June and September respectively are the possible objectives," he said.
